featured.text: Who wrote the book about Native Americans’ view of death? (A) Bruce Brooks.

definition.zh_def: 布魯斯，一個常見的男性名字，源於古法語，通常用作姓氏或名字。
definition.en_def: Bruce is a common male given name of Old French origin, often used as a surname or first name.
definition.example: Bruce is planning to run a marathon next month.
